Text:
Great game!

Haven't had this much fun since Postal 2 :D

Though the images are very heavy on my Macbook Pro... How the hell can I tweak this game a bit?

1920x1080 isn't playable, too low FPS, and my Macbook Pro has a pretty good geforce, so it must be some setting..

The problem is that Stubbs is not an Universal Binary (i.e. not compiled for Intel Macs) and only runs in an emulation environment. And unfortunately, the engine that the game uses runs like shit in that emulation environment. There isn't much you can do.
